querySimilarityMetrics

Class FeatureVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • querySimilarityMetrics.FeatureVector

  • public class FeatureVector
extends java.lang.Object
    this class hides details about the actual representation of a feature vector and provides a uniform representation
    Author:
    tingxie
